short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crosslist on eBay, Mercari, Poshmark, & more with the top reselling tool! Expand your reach easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use our reselling tool to crosslist and share your items for sale on many websites like eBay, Mercari, Poshmark, Depop, and Facebook, all at once!

Make Selling Easy and Help the Planet.

Our tool is like magic! It helps you not waste time putting your items up for sale over and over again. We made it super easy to use, so you can have more fun and less work.

We care a lot about keeping things simple and safe. Our tool works on websites you pick and keeps your private stuff safe. We put a little button on your sale that lets you put your items up for sale on many websites without doing it all again. You can even put it back up for sale on the same site easily.

Our extension allows you to crosslist the following fields:
1. Photos
2. Price
3. Description
4. Title
5. Category
6. Brand
7. Color

Think about how much more time you'll have and the extra money you can make!

To learn more, come visit us at a website made just for helping the Earth with all kinds of items, Listifyx. Let's make a difference together, one sale at a time!
